author: T. Jacob John and Prathap Tharyan
title: COVID-19 and the great Chinese puzzle
description: China does not know, or is not revealing, the magnitude of infection in the country
content:
The pandemic is spreading like wildfire. What started surreptitiously
sometime in late 2019 in Wuhan, China, has engulfed 172 countries and regions by March 25, 2020. Globally over 4,35,000 have been reported as confirmed infected, over 19,500 have died, and… [+10392 chars]
